problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠C = N_0, point D is on CB, DE ⊥ AB, if DE = N_1, CA = N_2, then \frac DBAB = ()
raw_answer: 解:由题意得,∠B=∠B,∠DEB=∠ACB=90°,故可得△BAC∽△BDE,从而有:\frac{DB}{AB}=\frac{DE}{AC}=\frac{1}{2}．故选:C．
raw_comment: 此题考查了相似三角形的判定和性质,得出△BAC∽△BDE,掌握相似三角形对应边成比例的性质是解答本题的关键．
